meanings.definition: A man of extraordinary or superhuman powers.
meanings.sent1: The superhero in the comic book is a superman who can fly and lift heavy objects.
meanings.sent2: My dad is my superman because he always knows how to fix things around the house.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, John dressed up as a superman with a cape and a mask.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, he becomes a superman, able to handle any challenge that comes his way.
meanings.sent5: The superman in the movie had the ability to see through walls and stop bullets with his bare hands.

meanings.definition: A person who is regarded as embodying the ideals of a particular characteristic or quality.
meanings.sent1: She is a superman of kindness, always helping those in need without expecting anything in return.
meanings.sent2: Martin Luther King Jr. is often seen as a superman of civil rights, fighting for equality and justice.
meanings.sent3: The teacher became a superman of patience as he calmly explained the lesson for the tenth time.
meanings.sent4: Her grandfather was a superman of wisdom, always giving sound advice to his family and friends.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter was a superman of bravery, rushing into burning buildings to save lives without hesitation.
